name: ai-literature-review-generator
description: AI-powered literature review generator with theme discovery and citation bundles

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=api
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=api
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=api
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules api/node_modules && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=api
scripts.workers:lint: cd workers && python -m ruff check . && python -m mypy .
scripts.workers:format: cd workers && python -m black . && python -m isort .

author: AI Literature Review Team
